name: Dean Infotech
description:
Dean Infotech is ISO 9001:2015 certified and government registered company providing end-to-end Software Development, Website Designing & Development, Mobile Apps Development, Salesforce.com Development and Digital Marketing Solution to its global clients since 1996.
A dedicated team of resources is working round the clock to provide continued services with 99.99% uptime guarantee. We have specialization in .Net/PHP/iOS/Android development/Salesforce Integration along with SEO/SMO services by Google Analytics and Adwords certified team members. Dean Infotech is Google Adwords partner to provide cost effective PPC services.
Our Services are:
Salesforce Development 
Salesforce Administrator
Salesforce Integration
Salesforce customization
Salesforce Integration
App Designing (UI/UX)
Web Designing (UI/UX)
Mobile App Development (IOS/Android)
Web Development
Software Development
E-commerce Development
Logo Designing
Website/eCommerce Portal Development​
 
READ MORE...
